features: 🎤【Wide Compatibility, Plug and Play】Compatible with Phones.you can conveniently enjoy recording songs on your iPhone and phones with type C port. This condenser microphone is compatible with Windows, MAC OS, IOS, Android, PS4. It can also be used for iPad and tablets with USB-C port. The mic podcast equipment is driver-free and plug-and-play design, you don’t have to install any software or complex settings. (Note: not compatible with Xbox)

🎤【Multifunction Mic 】: The mic is specially designed for radio studio, dubbing, podcasting, recording, gaming, MSN, Skype and conference chatting. Cardioid polar pattern condenser microphone for computer captures your voice properly, produce clear smooth and crisp sound without static noise.

🎤【Quality Ease of Use】 A premium construction design podcast microphone with a stable tripod stand is convenient when you are doing voice over or live streaming. It is easy to adjust, and you just need to unfold the tripod and attach it to the microphone. The the180-degree flexible design allows you to adjust the best angle. The high-quality foam windscreen prevents from popping, improves vocal recording quality. The microphone is very light and small, which is good for your home or travel.

🎤【Excellent Sound Quality】The USB microphone has a built-in professional sound chipset ,and can compatible iphone with iphone lightning, with a 192KHZ/24BIT sampling rate, which captures the clear and smooth sound when zoom meeting or gaming. Cardioid pickup pattern suppresses unwanted background noise and captures clear sound. It is perfect for recording, podcasting, streaming, zoom, skype, twitch, voice-over, YouTube video, Meetings ,Stage,etc.

🎤【Solid Construction&360°Rotation】Unlike other tripod stands, our detachable stable desktop stand is more stable and convenient, never fall apart or collapse when you are doing voice overs or livestreams on YouTube. Compact rugged metal construction dictation microphone for long-lasting performance. The stable metal stand enable you to 360°adjust the angle and height of the microphone to fit your working needs.

🎤【Mute&Noise-filter Function】You can mute your mic by simply press the “MUTE” button. If you press and hold the "MUTE" button for 2 seconds, it will turn on the noise reduction mode, filtering out more than 90% of the extra noise, and only captures the clear, smooth, and crisp sound in front of the microphone. This function enhances excellent sound quality.

🎤【Monitor Your Voice】There is a 3.5mm audio port on the microphone. You can plug your headphones in and monitor your recording voice in real-time and adjust necessary volume levels. It is perfect for podcasting, music/video recording, live streaming, gaming or online chatting.
🎤【What You Get】 1xMicrophone,1x110 inch USB Cable,1x iPhone lightning，1type-C Adapter,1x Table Stand,1xU Shape Mount,1x Support Column,1xPop Filter,1xSponge Cover,1xUser Manual.

🎤【Satisfaction After-sale Service Guarantee】Please buy it with confidence, we provide most friendly after-sale service, If you meet with any quality problems while using this product, please contact us in time, we offer 30-day money back guarantee, 12-month limited product warranty and our 24 hours customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly Professional Quality
reviews.reviewText: I do professional commercial voice-overs, and was stunned by the quality. True 20-20khz frequency range, without the “mud” in the 500hz range. True cardiod front-facing pickup. Works best with only included windscreen and working 6” from mic. Whisper or shout, and it digitally processes wonderfully. See pic for setup, and well modulated, even delivery on the wave of the audio recording software, after recording. I do slightly tweak the EQ, compression & add limiter to suit my needs per type of commercial read. Compactly replaced my previous pro XLR ribbon mic, tube Pre-amp, without losing the warmth.Headphone output lets you hear yourself, while recording.Truly plug & play, no need to download a driver. Note: At one point after year in use, mic driver became “unavailable.” Just a Windows & Dell update needed corrected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent sound quality, amazing price!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my daughter to start her own podcast channel teaching other kids her age how to play the guitar. she is also is an avid PC gamer, and has also been able to utilize this microphone with gaming as well.It’s a Very versatile and lightweight mic that’s easy to use and maneuver.For the price the sound quality is excellent. it surpassed my expectations and more!It came beautifully packaged and very easy to set up~ literally just plug and play. The instructions are user-friendly & easy to understand. It has gotten tons of use over the past couple of months, and holding up very well. The stand is durable and designed to last.Makes this a great investment as a starter microphone. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars GREAT Microphone, Documentation needs improvement
reviews.reviewText: The HARDware works WONDERFULLY. The documentation... is basically unreadable without a magnifying glass (see image). Attached photo was taken... at arms length. The Mic is literally a plug-n-play microphone (no drive needed on the Mac). The 'pickup' is very sensitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This microphone provides great sound and clarity for anyone that wants to do voice overs, studio recording, podcasts, etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy horrible
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a Christmas gift and the first 1 had a loud Hum and wouldn't pick up sounds. I got a replacement, think it would be better. Well it wasn't same loud humming this one won't even connect. At least the first one connected. I am absolutely disappointed I was hoping to get some use out of it. The light goes between bright and dim but nothing happens zero stars 😭👎🏽.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This has a loud hum
reviews.reviewText: I do not recommend this product, it has a loud hum that can be heard. Not great quality! Do not recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Microphone for Podcasting & More
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this microphone to help me increase the sound quality of my Podcast and my YouTube channel. I had it on my Wishlist for a while, but I was hesitant to purchase it because of the price. However, I do love it. The sound quality is good, and I am not sorry for the purchase. It has helped me with the background noise. The USB Microphone Kit was a wise purchase. It was worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for a student who needed a mic on an ipad for a documentary she filmed. It turned out to be great quality - much better than when she used in mic installed in the ipad. I highly recommend it, but keep in mind I'm just a librarian who does not record professionally. ;)
